title: Immersive Remix: "The Galactic Tourist Industrial Complex" by Tobias S. Buckell
description: Get a sneak peek of our our immersive sound! A cab driver spends an ordinary day ferrying passengers around Manhattan -- until an incident involving a wealthy alien tourist imperils his livelihood. Content advisory: alien death.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (Stitcher)
